channel.title: String index out of range: 22
channel.description: i was trying to add a kill count for godwars and now whenever anyone dies or uses a teleport i get an error and it says string index out of range: 22 about 30 times then disconnects me? does anyone know why that would happen?

item.title: String index out of range: 22

item.description:
@ryan_justin wrote:

oh thanks let me try it out[br][br][size=1]Posted on: December 16, 2009, 05:40:53 pm[/size][hr]wow thank you! id rep you if i could…

item.title: String index out of range: 22
item.dc:creator: @relmitos relmitos
item.description:
@relmitos wrote:

Lol just as i thought.

The 22 stands for the amount of characters in the string:character-saradomin. Or actually, where the string stops.

Armadyl should be 20.
Bandos should be 19.
Zammykills should be 23.

Read full topic

item.title: String index out of range: 22
item.dc:creator: @ryan_justin ryan justin
item.description:
@ryan_justin wrote:

oh right here:characterfile.newLine(); characterfile.write("character-saradomin = ", 0, 22); characterfile.write(Integer.toString(saraKills), 0, Integer.toString(saraKills).length()); characterfile.newLine(); characterfile.write("character-armadyl = ", 0, 22); characterfile.write(Integer.toString(armaKills), 0, Integer.toString(armaKills).length()); characterfile.newLine(); characterfile.write("character-bandos = ", 0, 22); characterfile.write(Integer.toString(bandosKills), 0, Integer.toString(bandosKills).length()); characterfile.newLine(); characterfile.write("character-zammykills = ", 0, 22); characterfile.write(Integer.toString(zamkills), 0, Integer.toString(zamkills).length()); characterfile.newLine(); i added the bandos and armadyl ones
